tutorialEntries: Sadly you are not the only one capable of using Java! The very magician that trapped you inside here also uses it to control his evil Skeletons! To your left you can see how they are instructed.

Note that their "attack()" method is exclusive to them, but to make up for it, they can't use items! Now protect the key and yourself from this fiend. Can you figure out what to do for yourself? You don't need to read the next message if you can...
Collect the key, then turn and collect the sword, turn back and kill the Skeleton with "useItem()".
